name: Full Ace Tennis Simulator
description: Full Ace Tennis Simulator is for those seeking unequaled tennis depth and fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D card with OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX9 512 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D card with OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX9 2 Gb DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Joypad
